text: Excellent location, leafy surroundings for quiet time in prayers

Truly a spiritual Oasis.
Whether you are a believer or not , come and pray for peace of mind and JOY

Just ended a retreat at CSC..
Came out feeling renewed...!

It is a sacred place where you encounter God, through retreats, regular masses,  healing and counselling sessions, etc. It is like a one-stop centre for us Catholics from all over Singapore. Plus fortunately for me it is located just a short walk away from my home. Oh yes and you can find a huge handsome Jesus face (it's actually Jim Cavaziel from 'Passion of the Christ')on the corner outside. Thank God for this place, and most of my experiences there, amen.

The young people there were very hospitable and kind and from their programmes, you know that they strive to be Disciples of Christ as they reach out and minister to those God send them to, or sent to them. Well done!
